summary.span: 用于描述由 管理的项的位置。

span.span: is used to describe the position of an item that is managed by .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 。 is used by . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用开始向前生成从开始处的项列表。The following example illustrates how to use to start generating forward from the beginning of an item list. [!code-csharp[GeneratorPositionSnippets#GenerateForwardFromBeginningCODE](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GeneratorPositionSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#generateforwardfrombeginningcode)] [!code-vb[GeneratorPositionSnippets#GenerateForwardFromBeginningCODE](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GeneratorPositionSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#generateforwardfrombeginningcode)] 下面的示例演示如何使用开始向后生成从项列表的末尾。The following example illustrates how to use to start generating backward from the end of an item list. [!code-csharp[GeneratorPositionSnippets#GenerateBackwardFromEndCODE](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GeneratorPositionSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#generatebackwardfromendcode)] [!code-vb[GeneratorPositionSnippets#GenerateBackwardFromEndCODE](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GeneratorPositionSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#generatebackwardfromendcode)] 下面的示例演示如何使用开始向前生成从项列表的中间。The following example illustrates how to use to start generating forward from the middle of an item list. [!code-csharp[GeneratorPositionSnippets#GenerateForwardFromMiddleCODE](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GeneratorPositionSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#generateforwardfrommiddlecode)] [!code-vb[GeneratorPositionSnippets#GenerateForwardFromMiddleCODE](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GeneratorPositionSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#generateforwardfrommiddlecode)]

param.name: index
param.span: 与已生成（已实现）项相关的 索引。

span.span: An index that is relative to the generated (realized) items.

param.span: -1 是表示项列表的开头或结尾处虚拟项的特殊值。

span.span: -1 is a special value that refers to a fictitious item at the beginning or the end of the items list.

param.name: offset
param.span: 与已索引项旁未生成（未实现）项相关的 偏移量。

span.span: An offset that is relative to the ungenerated (unrealized) items near the indexed item.

param.span: 偏移量为 0 表示已索引元素本身；偏移量为 1 表示下一未生成（未实现）项；偏移量为 -1 表示前一项。

span.span: An offset of 0 refers to the indexed element itself, an offset 1 refers to the next ungenerated (unrealized) item, and an offset of -1 refers to the previous item.

summary.span: 使用指定的索引和偏移量初始化 的新实例。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 偏移量为**0**索引元素本身，偏移量是指**1**下, 一步未生成 （未实现） 项和偏移量是指 **-1**指上一项。An offset of **0** refers to the indexed element itself, an offset **1** refers to the next ungenerated (unrealized) item, and an offset of **-1** refers to the previous item.
